Actions.Name: Wild Card
Actions.AutoHit: 1 damage and the foe is marked.
Actions.Mark: A card attaches to the target. The next time the target is hit by an attack, the card explodes in a blast 1 AoE explosion centered on them for [D]+[fray]. Foes within must save or become branded. Then, the mark clears.

Actions.Name: Weaken
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is pacified.

Actions.Name: Bend Fate
Actions.Description: The Abjurer chooses an ally in range 5. Until the end of their next turn, attacks gain +1 curse against that ally, and that ally gains +1 boon on attacks.
